archimate:Requirement.name: NC.1.5.8b: b) specifically enforce the principle of 'default deny' (e.g. by including a DENY-ALL rule (or equivalent) that applies after all other rules have been processed)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
